ygData.subject: RE: Market in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Artifacts of that magnitude would probably not deteriorate anyway. But wearing banded mail in the pouring rain for 1 year has to affect it somehow. I think it
ygData.messageBody:
Artifacts of that magnitude would probably not deteriorate anyway. But
wearing banded mail in the pouring rain for 1 year has to affect it somehow.
I think it is a good idea, but they should not bother with it now. Too much
coding involved. Maybe in the expansion pack or future projects.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: David Rogers [SMTP:derogers334@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 3:22 PM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Market in EQ
>
> From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
> --- velom@... wrote:
> > Has anyone thought of or actually talked to Verant
> > about having armor wear out? ...
> > I don't know if this seems like a good idea or not.
> > I think it does. Let me know what you all think of
> > this idea.
>
> I hope Verant *never* implements any sort of item
> degredation system. It would definitely *not* be fun;
> especially with the camp lengths you have to endure
> for some highly choice items (PGT comes to mind, as
> does Rubicite, or holyswords, etc...).
>
> ===
> :D
> Dave's World
> -No matter where you go, there you are-
> "People will believe a lie either because they want to
> believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
> First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
